DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare regenerative result use separately two different xenograft two-step sinus floor elevation .
DOC.brief_title: Sinus Floor Elevation Using Separately Two Different Xenografts - A Prospective Randomized Clinical Trial
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients present moderately severely atrophic posterior maxilla 16 mm residual alveolar bone . 2 . Men woman age 18 year . 3 . Patient sign Informed Consent . 1 . Chronic steroid therapy . 2 . Uncontrolled diabetes . 3 . Cardiovascular disease . 4 . Past irradiation head neck . 5 . Maxillary sinus cyst . 6 . Active chronic sinusitis . 7 . Smoking ten cigarette per day 3 month precede study . 8 . Malignant disease 5 year precede study . 9 . Uncontrolled bleed disorder : hemophilia , thrombocytopenia , granulocytopenia 10 . Disease compromise immune system 11 . Psychiatric disorder 12 . Hypersensitivity titanium , collagen bovine bone . 13 . Women pregnant nursing . 14 . Patients nontreated periodontal disease . 15 . Medical and/or general contraindication intraoral surgical procedure .
